If I run the command `dcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'`, I will immediately receive 0.975 GOLD in my wallet, right?

No, that's not correct. Running that command will not immediately give you 0.975 GOLD in your wallet. Instead, it will effectively park your conversion until the GOLD token launches. Once the token launches, you will either find 0.975 GOLD in your wallet or have your VRSCTEST back.

dcurrency "*" '[{"address":"mike@","convertto":"gold","preconvert":1,"amount":100}]'
```
that would effectively park my conversion until the token launches, at which point, I will either find 0.975 GOLD in my wallet, or I will have my VRSCTEST back.
